did.unittitle: John Adamson certificate of exemption from military duty
did.abstract: A certificate of issued by the New York State Artillery, 2nd Regiment, 1st Brigade to John Adamson, exempting him from military duty for the remainder of his life following eleven years of service in the Brigade. The document is dated 1819.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The document was formally accessioned in 1974.
